description: End users may experience compromised confidential data security when utilizing affected products due to an information disclosure vulnerability in the Microsoft AllJoyn API, identified as CVE-2024-38257. This can result in the exposure of sensitive information, as access to uninitialized memory could allow unauthorized disclosure of system resources. Such incidents could be observed in the products and builds including Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.4169), Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based systems (10.0.19045.4894), and others. Users are advised to check for updates and apply security fixes as outlined in KB-5043076, KB-5043064, and KB-5043067 to mitigate the risk of information exposure.
